name: Devenup Health, LLC
tagline: Healthcare brand promotion using MRank technology
description:
We know how to reach your target audience and raise your healthcare brand in the digital space. For this, we have gathered a team that combines years of experience in IT, marketing and work on healthcare projects. A consistent approach to the digital representation of your brand is ensured by a comprehensive set of services we offer:
 
- Digital strategy creation and further guidance during its implementation.
Websites and mobile apps development with a focus on healthcare brands specifics.
- All-inclusive brand promotion across top social media networks and search engines based on our own MRank marketing technology.
- Video production services including explainer videos, 2D animation promo, and video footages promo.
 
Spheres we are successfully working in: 
 
- Clinical laboratory testing
- Dermatology treatment and skin care
- Genomic health
- Alopecia treatment and hair transplant
- Hospitality and sports rehabilitation.
 
Our clients choose us not just for our creative custom approach, but for our technological expertise, analytic background and for our reputation as reliable partners. So, are you with us?
